title: Sci-Fi Sounds - Volume II
description: Your Scifi Game will come to life!
longDescription:
Hi Dev!


This is a sci-fi game sound effects pack with a variety of elements to enrich the gameplay, featuring doors, beeps, computer sounds, soundscapes, passing ships, user interface and more!


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Variety

In this package you will find a folder called 'Layers' where you will find the layers used to make the sounds, considerably increasing the number of possibilities that you will have when investing in these sound effects, and also with a slight pitch variation in each sound you can generate dozens of new effects.


Quality

All sound effects were recorded with professional microphones and recorders ensuring the best possible audio quality, they were also professionally treated in post processing to ensure that there would be no loss of quality, there are also effects made directly with synthesizers, guaranteeing exclusivity and originality of all of them.


Securing your investment

In the preview you can hear ALL the sound effects before buying to make sure you have something you are looking for, of course there is a watermark to protect the sounds but you can hear them perfectly :)


Helping each other

By investing in this package, you'll take everything described above and help me to continue creating more sound effects for developers!


Support

I am always available on the documentation email for any eventuality
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 182

Number of Audio Cues: 182

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains 'loop' on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The cover image was made by NightCafe
